item.title: PyCon & PyData 2024 - a wiered event
item.description: #PyCon and hashtag#PyData Berlin is over and we collectively have landed back in reality. In retrospect I have mixed feelings about the conference. On the plus side I was lucky to meet with a diverse group of interesting people, especially during the social event. ðŸ¥³ Unfortunately the quality of the talks was very hit and miss.
